author: mcooper
msg: MessageBundle's "org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.convert.DateTimeConverter.CONVERT_XXXX_detail" strings like "Enter a date in the same format as this example: {2}" are meaningless without an example string.
While the Java implementation always provides an example string, some JavaScript implementations might not, so use the actual first pattern as a fallback.

msg: Ad Blocker Plus plugin w/ Social Media blocking blocks our non-intrusive use of social media.  Period solves the issue.
